trans-unit.source: Defines a command that implements <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and is routed through the element tree.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un comando che implementa <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>ed è indirizzato tramite l'albero degli elementi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> class with the specified name and owner type.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> classe con il tipo di nome e il proprietario specificato.

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Nome dichiarato per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The type which is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: Tipo che sta registrando il comando.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: ownerType is .
trans-unit.target: ownerTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> class with the specified name, owner type, and collection of gestures.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> classe con il nome specificato, il tipo di proprietario e raccolta dei movimenti.

trans-unit.source: Declared name for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Nome dichiarato per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The type that is registering the command.
trans-unit.target: Tipo che sta registrando il comando.

trans-unit.source: Default input gestures associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: Impostazione predefinita i movimenti di input associati a questo comando.

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> can execute in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Determina se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> può essere eseguito nello stato corrente.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that determines if a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute on the current command target is not contained in the CanExecute methods, rather CanExecute raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: La logica effettiva che determina se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>eseguire sull'oggetto destinazione comando non è contenuta nei metodi CanExecute, ma piuttosto CanExecute genera <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>gli <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>eventi il tunneling e a bolle tramite l'elemento della struttura ad albero di ricerca di un oggetto con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> e</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per tale <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene trovato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler>collegato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> can execute or not.
trans-unit.target: Questi gestori forniscono la logica di programmazione per determinare se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>può eseguire o meno.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>E <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>vengono generati in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>non è impostata sul <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>vengono generati eventi sull'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user defined data type.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di dati definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The command target.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione del comando.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il comando può essere eseguito il comando sulla destinazione corrente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: target is not a or .
trans-unit.target: targetis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando vengono rilevate delle modifiche per l'origine del comando dal gestore del comando.

trans-unit.source: These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Queste modifiche influiscono sui spesso se il comando deve eseguire il comando sulla destinazione corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> listens for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, which is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>Attende l' <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento, che viene generato da <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento viene generato ogni volta che vengono soddisfatte le condizioni che potrebbero modificare se eseguire il comando, ad esempio una modifica nello stato attivo della tastiera.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>

trans-unit.source: When the command receives the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event, it raises the CanExecuteChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il comando riceve il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento, viene generato l'evento CanExecuteChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>

trans-unit.source: Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In genere, si attenderà l'origine del comando per questo evento e query di <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>per mezzo del <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte delle origini di comando verranno disabilitate se il comando non può essere eseguito come parte dell'associazione del comando.

trans-unit.source: An example of this is when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> grays itself out when the command cannot be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un esempio è quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>diventa inattivo quando non è possibile eseguire il comando.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: In some situations, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>è a conoscenza di una modifica nelle condizioni che modifica la possibilità di eseguire un comando.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, you can force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method, this will in turn cause the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> to raise the CanExecuteChanged event.
trans-unit.target: In questi casi, è possibile forzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>su Genera il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested>evento chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A>(metodo), ciò determinerà il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>per generare l'evento CanExecuteChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> sulla destinazione del comando corrente.

trans-unit.source: The actual logic that executes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is not contained in the Execute methods.
trans-unit.target: La logica effettiva che esegue il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>non è contenuto in metodi Execute.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: Execute raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events, which tunnel and bubble through the element tree looking for an object with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire genera <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>ed <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>eventi, il tunneling e a bolle tramite l'elemento di struttura ad albero ricerca per un oggetto con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> for that <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is found, then the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> attached to <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>per tale <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>viene trovato, il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>collegato a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>

trans-unit.source: These handlers supply the programming logic that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Questi gestori forniscono la logica di programmazione che esegue il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>E <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>vengono generati in <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A> is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> events are raised on the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>non è impostata sul <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>vengono generati eventi sull'elemento con stato attivo della tastiera.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: User defined parameter to be passed to the handler.
trans-unit.target: Parametro da passare al gestore definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Element at which to begin looking for command handlers.
trans-unit.target: Elemento in corrispondenza del quale iniziare la ricerca dei gestori di comando.

trans-unit.source: target is not a or .
trans-unit.target: targetis not a or .

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"></xref> objects that are associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputGesture"> </xref> gli oggetti che sono associati a questo comando.

trans-unit.source: The input gestures.
trans-unit.target: I movimenti di input.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del comando.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used when referencing a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata quando si fa riferimento un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: The name of the command.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del comando.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is registered with the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo registrato con il comando.

trans-unit.source: The type of the command owner.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del proprietario del comando.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute*>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: Dati utilizzati dal comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non richiede dati da passare, questo oggetto può essere impostato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this command can be executed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questo comando può essere eseguito; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this members, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute*>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute*>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro è un'implementazione esplicita dell'interfaccia di un membro.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface.
trans-unit.target: E può essere utilizzato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>esegue il cast dell'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: Data used by the command.
trans-unit.target: Dati utilizzati dal comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando non richiede dati da passare, questo oggetto può essere impostato <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
